#### **📂 File & Code Structure:**  
> - Create/Modify Django app: `your_app_name`  
> - Define models in `models.py`  
> - Implement views in `views.py`  
> - Use HTML templates in `templates/your_app_name/`  
> - Routes in `urls.py`
